song.englishname: We Wish You A Merry Christmas

english.segment1: so we'll drive as fast as we can go. through the black night, black ice and all snow. till we see some street signs that we know. we're coming home
english.segment2: good tidings we bring. to you and your kin. good tidings for christmas and a happy new year
english.segment3: we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas, and a happy new year
english.segment4: we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas, and a happy new year
english.segment5: And so when the words we sing are gone. i pray God's blessing continues on. We laugh and compliment this. Merry Christmas
english.segment6: good tidings we bring. to you and your kin. good tidings for christmas and a happy new year
english.segment7: we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas, and a happy new year
english.segment8: we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas. we wish you a merry christmas, and a happy new year
